On Linux:
	install AndroidNDK from https://developer.android.com/ndk/downloads/index.html
	set env var ANDROID_NDK="path/to/android-ndk"

	open CMake GUI
		set src location to AugmentedUnreality/ThirdParty/opencv/src/opencv
		add key:
			ANDROID_NATIVE_API_LEVEL = "19"
		click "Configure"
			-> specify toolchain for cross compiling
			-> choose: AugmentedUnreality/ThirdParty/opencv/src/opencv/platforms/android/android.toolchain.cmake

		set additional modules = AugmentedUnreality/ThirdParty/opencv/src/opencv_contrib/modules
		set WITH_CUDA = false
		set install prefix = AugmentedUnreality/ThirdParty/opencv/install/Android

		click "Generate"
